identificationModule.briefTitle: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of Y-2(Edaravone And Borneol) Sublingual Tablet
identificationModule.officialTitle: Sublingual Y-2(Edaravone And Borneol) Tablet For Acute Ischemic And Hemorrhagic Patients-the SALVAGE Trial

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The primary objective is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of single ascending dose of Y-2 sublingual tablets in healthy male and female adult subjects. The secondary objective is to characterize the single-dose pharmacokinetics of Y-2 sublingual tablets in healthy male and female adult subjects.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: This study will be a single-center, single ascending dose study in healthy male and female subjects. A total of 24 subjects, 4 cohorts of 6 subjects each, will be enrolled in this study. All of the 6 subjects in each cohort will receive a single dose of Y-2 sublingual tablet on a single occasion. Prior to taking the drug and after taking the drug at 5 min to 24 h, venous blood from all subjects will be collected at different time points for PK analysis. After dosing, safety and tolerability data for each cohort will be evaluated.

armGroups.label: Y-2(Edaravone And Borneol) sublingual tablet
interventionNames: Drug: Y-2(Edaravone And Borneol) Sublingual Tablet

interventions.name: Y-2(Edaravone And Borneol) Sublingual Tablet
interventions.description: Y-2 sublingual tablet at single ascending doses of one tablet , two tablets, three tablets, four tablets

primaryOutcomes.measure: Number of participants who experience treatment-related adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs)
primaryOutcomes.description: Any untoward medical events during this study were categorized as severe, moderate, or mild, and related or not related to study treatment

secondaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate Maximum Plasma Concentration \[Cmax\] of Y-2 in patients tested
To evaluate Time of Observed Cmax\[tmax\] of Y-2 in patients tested

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Area Under the concentration-time Curve from time zero to the last detectable concentration[AUC0-t]
secondaryOutcomes.description: To evaluate Area Under the concentration-time Curve from time zero to the last detectable concentration\[AUC0-t\] of Y-2 in patients tested

locations.facility: OSF Healthcare System d/b/a Saint Francis Medical
